channel.title: Shopware-6s on Shyim's Brain
channel.description: Recent content in Shopware-6s on Shyim's Brain

item.title: Cluster Setup
item.description: This guide assumes you are using Shopware 6.3.0.0 or later

item.title: DAL exceptions
item.description: Expected input to be non empty non associative array. The entity repositories are built for multiple operations. Example array: [ [ 'name' => 'Test' ] ] Recrusion with OneToOne Association Both sides of the association should not have autoload enabled. Otherwise you have an never-ending recrusion

item.title: General exceptions
item.description: PageController can’t be requested via XmlHttpRequest By default Ajax is disabled on all Storefront controllers. You can enable it by adding an new defaults XmlHttpRequest Example: /** * @Route("/widgets/test", name="widgets.test", options={"seo"="false"}, methods={"GET"}, defaults={"XmlHttpRequest"=true}) */

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hey my name is Shyim. In this personal Knowledgebase I will share with you some Tips and Tricks about Shopware.
